name: node-c
description: An end-to-end NodeJS framework for building DDD apps on top of NestJS.

scripts.build:clean:all: npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/core && npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/persistance-rdb && npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/persistance-typeorm && npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/persistance-clickhouse && npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/persistance-redis && npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/domain-iam && npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/api-http && npm run build:clean --workspace=packages/api-rest
scripts.publish-package:all: npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/core && npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/persistance-rdb && npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/persistance-typeorm && npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/persistance-clickhouse && npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/persistance-redis && npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/domain-iam && npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/api-http && npm run publish-package --workspace=packages/api-rest
